about_the_game:
Light of the Locked World is a fantasy role-playing game inspired by oldschool MMORPGs.

Start a new life and find your way in a young world threatened by a mind control crisis.

Features:

  • Everpresent darkness: The disembodied voice, the iron merchants, the fallen royal family, the dead city, the abyssal stones, the sunken sarcophagus of an eschatological entity - it’s all linked. The light is above the abyss, can you save it?
  • Unusual setting: Enter a struggling world inspired by the Baltic States, learn auric magic that powers an industrial revolution, become hooked on this strange mix of fantasy, steampunk, western, and isekai genres.
  • Humble beginnings: With no grand legacy or special powers, our protagonist starts as an average citizen, making your rise to power that much more satisfying.
  • Modernized oldschool: Impactfulness and simplicity of oldschool RPG meets modern-day streamlining, aiming to deliver the best of both worlds.
  • Open and atmospheric world: Freely roam in a world with lively settlements, lush meadows, desolate deserts, and massive structures.
  • Intense combat: Conquer the lawless lands with the game's real-time combat system - wield magical, mechanical, and medieval weapons, perform and dodge deadly attacks.
  • Extensive character development: Build an arsenal of equipment for your character, master combat and crafting by leveling classes, earn faction respect, learn spells.
  • Play together: The game has local multiplayer support for two players - cooperate to overcome challenges or compete for territory and resources.
